civ.name: Spanish
civ.rollovername: All around roster and fast shipments. Best at: Fighting and Using Shipments.

civ.name: British
civ.rollovername: Free Settlers and Redcoats when building Manors and Barracks. Early Factories and a larger navy. Best at: Sea and Military Boom.

civ.name: French
civ.rollovername: All-around civilization with better villagers. All Barracks and Stable units have Royal Guard upgrades. Best at: Cavalry.

civ.name: Portuguese
civ.rollovername: Receive a free Town Center Wagon and 2 Fishing Boats with each Age up. Best at: Sea and Economic Boom.

civ.name: Dutch
civ.rollovername: Can build Banks to produce Coin and receive resources back with every unit you train. Best at: Generating Resources and Countering Units.

civ.name: Russians
civ.rollovername: Train units in blocks, Field Hospitals improve the hitpoints of nearby units, when a building is destroyed it slows enemy units around it. Best at: Military and Defending.

civ.name: Germans
civ.rollovername: Free Uhlans with every Shipment, military regenerate hitpoints while idle, Krupp Factory generates artillery units for free. Best at: Harassing and Military Boom.

civ.name: Ottomans
civ.rollovername: Automatically train Settlers. Unit are stronger, give you more training experience, but can't be upgraded until Imperial Age. Infantry and cavalry generate Coin when sieging. Best at: Raiding and Fighting.

civ.name: Habsburgs
civ.rollovername: Obtain other civilization bonuses every Age Up. All military units are mercenaries. Best at: Military.

civ.name: Italians
civ.rollovername: Get two types of villagers, the Merchant and the Architect. Unique units have greater range but bad melee. Get better Religion and Spies. Best at: Supporting and Countering Units.

civ.name: Belgians
civ.rollovername: A free Frontier Wagon comes with each Age Up. Trading Posts weaken enemy economies and native warriors. Native warriors are 10% cheaper and have a unique roster of native units. Best at: Expanding and Natives.

civ.name: Danish
civ.rollovername: Start the game with a free shipment. Age up 50% faster. Upon every age up a Golden Age begins, during which experience from combat and gather rates are temporarily increased. Whenever a shipments arrives a minor Golden Age temporarily increases experience from combat. Best at: Fighting and Support.

civ.name: Swedish
civ.rollovername: Can build Annexes onto buildings to obtain additional advantages. Allotments quickly train armies of units at reduced, but escalating cost. Can build Sawmills to harvest Wood. Best at: Building and Defending.

civ.name: XPIroquois
civ.rollovername: Can build cheaper Trading Posts, buildings drop resources when destroyed. Travois construct buildings for free. Best at: Expanding and Booming.

civ.name: XPSioux
civ.rollovername: Start the game with 200 population capacity. Units siege damage increases on each Age Up. Best at: Cavalry and Raiding.

civ.name: XPAztec
civ.rollovername: Warrior Priests can dance at the firepit for greater effect. Best at: Infantry and Fighting.

civ.name: Tawantinsuyu
civ.rollovername: Villagers generate Coin. All buildings cost Coin. Best at: Infantry and Booming.

civ.name: WallMapu
civ.rollovername: Tribal Council members are in battle, and can send many shipments at the same time. Everything gives you more experience, villagers generate experience. Best at: Harassing and Using Shipments.

civ.name: Tupinamba
civ.rollovername: Have two types of villagers. Don't use Coin. Most military units can use stealth and can train military units in Longhouses. Best at: Infantry and Countering Units.

civ.name: Japanese
civ.rollovername: No hunting allowed. Shrines attract animals and generate resources. Can send most Shipments twice. Infantry units deal siege damage in melee. Best at: Infantry and Military Booming.

civ.name: Chinese
civ.rollovername: Trains Banner Armies made of two types of military units. Houses are replaced by Villages, which give Villagers each age-up, train defensive units and receive Shipments. Best at: Defending and Booming.

civ.name: Indians
civ.rollovername: Villagers cost Wood. Generates experience points from livestock at Sacred Field. Receives Villagers with each Home City Shipment. Best at: Overall Booming.

civ.name: Koreans
civ.rollovername: Military units can garrison in most buildings. Enemy military buildings improve the stats of ships. Buildings regenerate. Best at: Navy and Turtling.

civ.name: Egyptians
civ.rollovername: All buildings are replaced by mobile caravans. Villagers gather slower but are cheaper. Best at: Raiding and Expanding.

civ.name: Ethiopians
civ.rollovername: Buildings are stronger. Porters construct buildings for free and are constantly spawned from the Town Center. Best at: Infantry and Defending.

civ.name: Zulu
civ.rollovername: Military units are trained by maturing Youths. Youths are constantly spawned from the Ikhandas and Matriarchs. Best at: Infantry and Harassing.

civ.name: Bulgarians
civ.rollovername: Military unit cards transform opalchentsi into the unit they send. Can train opalchentsi in blocks at the Town Center. Unlock units one age later. Best at: Defending and Late Game.

civ.name: Greeks
civ.rollovername: Buildings leave ruins when destroyed. Each Politician favors a strong card. Docks automatically train Fishing Ships and you can increase their limit by researching techs at its building. Best at: Sea and Using Shipments.

civ.name: Romanians
civ.rollovername: Get access to two types of villagers. Can upgrade their buildings regardless of the Age they are in for an increased price. Gets rewards for researching all the technologies of a building of each age. Best at: Booming.

civ.name: Serbians
civ.rollovername: Nearby units get stronger when a unit dies. Can set their own buildings on fire to damage the enemy and deny them Experience. Best at: Military and Fighting.

civ.name: Argentineans
civ.rollovername: Herdables spawn automatically from Livestock Pens. Cavalry units move faster each Age Up. Best at: Cavalry and Booming.

civ.name: Bolivians
civ.rollovername: Gain a Faith trickle from researching Native lore improvements. Religious technologies increase the bounties of Native Warriors. Villagers are free but temporary and eventually transform into Native Warriors. Best at: Religion and Natives.

civ.name: Brazilians
civ.rollovername: Have additional options for Immigrants and Religion. African Slaves can be bought in bulk. Receive a free Agricultural Wagon with each Age up. Best at: Booming and Military.

civ.name: Centralamericans
civ.rollovername: Villagers gather more resources from natural sources. Can choose between six different unit rosters. Age down to get the age-up bonus again or to pick a different roster. Best at: Military and Politicians.

civ.name: Chileans
civ.rollovername: Receive resource crates with each shipment. Villagers gather slower but economic technologies are stronger. Best at: Booming.

civ.name: Colombians
civ.rollovername: Infantry and cavalry can construct cheaper tent buildings. Each Age up a member state is expelled and the rewards of all the remaining Politicians are received. Villagers can heal. Best at: Rushing and Military.

civ.name: Haitians
civ.rollovername: Age up costs and times are exaggerated. Military units are stronger the further they are from Town Centers. Villagers can be revived with Faith if they fall unconscious. Best at: Raiding and Rushing.

civ.name: Mexicans
civ.rollovername: Start the game with a Presidio Wagon. Tombs that trickle Food appear upon a villager's death. Receive Dolientes for each technology researched. Best at: Booming and Defending.

civ.name: Paraguayans
civ.rollovername: Economy based on industrial buildings that generate resources. Villagers can be used as combatants. Weak cannon fodder units train automatically from Barracks and Stables. Best at: Defending and Military Outnumbering.

civ.name: Peruvians
civ.rollovername: Units move faster and have more line of sight when nearby units die. Have extra upgrades in military buildings to improve a specific set of units or all of them. Can train decoys. Villagers can garrison in most buildings. Best at: Military and Rushing.

civ.name: Uruguayans
civ.rollovername: Have access to all Immigrant options. Receive a free universal Immigrant Wagon with each Age up. Villagers support their own population space. Best at: Immigrants and Mercenaries.

civ.name: Australians
civ.rollovername: Convict Labourers are expensive villagers that bring a Sheep for free when you train them. Best at: Military and Harassing.

civ.name: Canadians
civ.rollovername: Buildings spawn Maple Trees when built. Get extra team cards. Best at: Supporting an Ally.

civ.name: UnitedStates
civ.rollovername: Get extra technologies. Great Companies provide a Great Company Stand and more technologies. Best at: Late Game.

civ.name: Maori
civ.rollovername: Supports population in fortified villages called Pā. Can train infantry in blocks of ten. Training units boost the speed of all units on the map. Best at: Booming and Fighting.
